div1.head: James W. Huntley to Brother May the 9 1863
div1.p:
I received your letter to night
and it found me in good health
and hope that these fien times will
find you the same Ambrose has had
one of them gatherings in his throat
but it is getting better we have built
us new quarters we built them on
our own expense there is eight men
in each house they Cost $5 dollars a piece
and it is bitter than to stay and
in dy die in them old Camps they
are 12 x 16 and they are nice ones to
we have just moved in and i have
got my things put away and am going
to write all the Evening this evening
if I i can think of any thinks
of any thinks to write you wanted
to know how to pay for that
land i think that it would bee best
for to take that money that
James Halbot has ha got of mine
and take what I send home to
I think that would be the best way
and if you think it would bee good
you may do it and you may plow
up g all the ground that you want

They are having a hard time down
to Fredricksburgh but i guess that
we will do something this time
I hope so at any rate

Old Stoneman is bin giving them hard
deed within 9 miles of Richmond and
taring up the rail tracks and
raising the old nick It is
Roomered in the City last night
that he had taken Richmond but
I guess that is not so but
I wish that it might be so
You don't did not tell me who
that other girl was down there
that was in such a bad way
but I can tell you I guess her
name is nancy is it not haint
I a yanky for guessing

Sunday the 10 Washington D C
this is Sunday now and
I am on grand to day and just
bin releived and will finish my
letter I have got rid of enspectin
duty for that I have got to answer
four or five letters to day if I
can get time I had one from Old
ham Halbot and one from little
ham that I have not ans yet
and must to day if I can
I am as strong for Old
McCelan as I was when I left
home and I believe that he is the
man yet he is here in Washington
now I have not got sight of him yet
but I should like to see him
to I and see how he looks
I must give up for this time
you must give my love to
all the folks down there and
espealy the girls for i thinks every
thing of them and will bid
you good day
